body:
The third_party/toolchains/gpus/cuda/cuda/cuda_config.h seems a little different, but it should be usable.

With a quick glance, the difference between Jetpack_Android_3.0/cuda-8.0/targets/aarch64-linux-androideabi/include/thrust/system/cuda/detail/cub and external/cub_archive are device_segmented_radix_sort.cuh and device_segmented_reduce.cuh.cuh

I will take a closer look on Monday.

If we don't include these two files. the compilation will fail. We need to exclude more than 10 source codes which seems unacceptable to me.
